channel.title: federated learning on Pallavi Ramicetty
channel.description: Recent content in federated learning on Pallavi Ramicetty

item.title: 4 - Federated Learning
item.description: Very important concept for training models with private data without uploading the user’s private data into the cloud.

item.title: Tensorflow: Data and Deployment Specialization at Coursera
item.description: Maybe we have trained a model in Jupyter Notebook or in our system, but how do we take that model and have it be running 24⁄7, have it serve actual user queries, and create value? This course will teach us how to do all that using TensorFlow.
